website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose speaker that is more durable and weather resistant than typical audio speaker upgrades.
pros: High-quality exterior build will keep moisture, dirt, and debris from damaging the delicate internal speaker parts
Can be used on boats or as a replacement speaker inside a car
cons: Speakers can be difficult to install in mismatched holes

customer_reviews.title: Best $15 speakers out there!
customer_reviews.text: The negative reviews are people expecting JL Audio quality out of 15.00 speakers. These things are great for what they are. This is my third set, not because they went bad, I just have them in all of my boats. They sound pretty good and for the price, if I ever have to replace them, hey it’s 15 bucks. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One finally went bad.. Oh well at that price who is ...
customer_reviews.text: Time for New ones after 3 years in my bay Boat where salt water would run down into them. I would even spray them down with the Saltwater wash down and they played well for years.. One finally went bad.. Oh well at that price who is complaining.. I did however, before in installed them, soaked them down with some anti corrosion spray which probably extended the life..
customer_reviews.author: roland l hurney

customer_reviews.title: quality and modern design, very well built
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these to replace my old rotted outdoor speakers. Arrived well packed with wire and screws, although I only wanted the speakers themselves. They are great design and appear very very weather resistant. No doubt they will last for a long time outside in the weather. If I ever get another boat I will quickly buy these for it. and The price was great!!
customer_reviews.author: lori W Buzz171

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not make it 10 months before they both quit working. You get what you pay for. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FMartin293

customer_reviews.title: Low quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: These turned our to be low quality sounding speakers very disappointed but for the cost what can I expect. Wasn’t willing to cut holes in my boat for these speakers. Low quality produce static and sound as if they are going to blow once music is turned up only half way. Have bought this brand before and never felt as if past merchandise was such low quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but you get what you pay for you can still hear cruising your boat on the lake
customer_reviews.author: Jorge.e

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isn't as good as others, but overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave 4 stars on durability is because I’ve only had them a couple months. So far they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peugh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these speakers in my Polaris RZR and I'm happy with them. They sound good for the price! I paired them up with the Pyle Marine Mp3 amplifier and this set up was all I needed for getting some tunes on the trails. I didn't want to spend a ton of money on high end equipment that will just get beat up in the woods and in the mud so these speakers were the perfect solution to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: BAS2k3

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. Probably okay, will never know!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return wrong size! They didn’t have the size I neeeded.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: good value and sound for price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced speakers in my boat. They were easy to install, and sound as good as the Sony speakers that were in boat. They are a great value for the price. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Feld

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong honestly it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Sashy’s Sweets

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for cost, but dont expect $100 speaker quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use outside for a Christmas light show, I have to say i am blow away by how amazing these sound. Now, don't get me wrong, they are cheap and are not the best sound quality or even frequency response but for $20, these are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D

customer_reviews.title: Yep, its all PVC
customer_reviews.text: These work well, or at least they used to. I took one of them apart because all I wanted was a mounted cone in a non-metallic basket. The basket and magnet housing is all molded together as one unit. It cuts well with a hacksaw. The magnet is good for holding tools and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Sharrow

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the $
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... Lasted me 1 season on my boat... Can't handle daily UV exposure :(
customer_reviews.author: psychodoc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, returned
customer_reviews.text: Terrible sound, if you cut it up loud enough to hear 3 feet away it's 50% distortion and 50% mid monotone sadness
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: $14 for a pair, bought two pair and put in my boat with the round pyle marine radio... bad ass sound and plenty loud without an amp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price.  Works well in the hot tub.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great in my hot tub. Plenty of high- and mid-range sound. Low-range is not great, as to be expected from a 2-way speaker of this size. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Holy Joe 722

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, everything is great. Good product. We are satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, everything is great. Good product. We are satisfied
customer_reviews.author: natali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product has good quality sound like the bass reflex couldn't complain especially for the price would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Preston

customer_reviews.title: Works great in vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my truck which had a moisture problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for bathroom speakers. Put 1 in the shower ceiling and 1 in the ceiling over the sink. The shower 1 works great, the other died within a couple months. UPDATE: the other is dead now too. Expected them to las longer indoors
customer_reviews.author: HILLs of the BEACH

customer_reviews.title: Good but wrong Spects
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers but were hard to mount since the speakers are nearly twice as deep as the printed spects show.
customer_reviews.author: Goofy Gary

customer_reviews.title: With some adjusting, they work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as replacement door speakers for a 1993 Nissan Sentra. Installing was interesting. I had to open the panel a little and use the screws that came with the set. The are a little big for an OEM replacement. I suggest going smaller than 6.5-inch speakers. The sound quality is pretty good. I don't have a good equalizer in my car so I can't speak much to the speakers' capabilities. But they are fuctional and the car can be made to receive them if you don't mind pulling out the Jig Saw and altering the door panel a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fitzmaurice

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but the speakers are coming out of the mounting base. Will probably replace
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The best bang for the buck for a waterproof speaker, not for high power but awesome in a work vehicle where its wet all the time
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for $16
customer_reviews.text: I got these marine speakers to mount on the outside of my 04 monte carlo. A few zipties later music is coming from where my foglights used to be. They don't SCREAM like I thought they would so I sold em for $20 and got a power horn from radio shack. If you're going for the "wake up the entire neighborhood" sound, I suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jamez K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great for the money. Have them blasting on the trail in my rzr.
customer_reviews.author: brian szefler

customer_reviews.title: Shhh
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift. Not hooked up yet but looks good. Cant wait to hear them in my RAZR while out riding
customer_reviews.author: joycat

customer_reviews.title: They sound good for a boat
customer_reviews.text: Put them in my boat. Still rocking. They sound good for a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin4e

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly in our 4 wheerler and they sound amazing. They were exactly what we were looking for and more
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Pile speakers
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great for the money put them in my utv they do the job everything I expected. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: almost water proof!
customer_reviews.text: advertised as water resistant intended for boats and cars. Mounting hardware is not Stainless Steel. just plated screws and backer clips!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Connectors will rust and stop working.
customer_reviews.text: I love China for making all goods affordable to everyone. However, one should never call it as marine graded speakers. Less than 6 months and the connectors are all rusty. Sound quality is acceptable for the price. Very easy to install. You need to replace them every 6 months. I would never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about purchasing a set of marine speakers. The reviews were very favorable of them so I decided to try them. I am glad I did. They arrived in a short time and were easy to install. Once I activated them I was surprised at the quality of sound
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mchugh

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound very tinny with little mid range capability. I added a subwoofer that helped. I bought 4 of these speakers and 2 of the 4 have failed after getting wet. Apparently they are not waterproof as described. I am now attempting to find out how to return and I cannot find any warranty return information on the page of the item. I guess I contact Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: No Treble
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these Pyles. I bought them for the durable grill since their location on my boat takes a beating, but the treble is awful and definitely not per spec. It's night and day compared to the Jensen 6.5's in the back. Sorry Pyle, I hoped you would place better sound in these, but they are headed to the garage sale pile.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They work great for a cheap pair of speakers. If your looking for a great sound quality when the music is loud, these arent the ones to buy. My boat is a pos and I'm not spending money on fixing it, so they work great for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat these for the money! They sound like $40 speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easy and work great! Perfect for our camper
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it ,;-)
customer_reviews.text: Really worth my while, completely upgrade the RV sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Christian Noel

customer_reviews.title: I'm will keep buying them
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set I've bought the first are on the out side of my toy hauler they sound clear all they way over to the campfire for the last two years. I got two more pairs for my Commander 1000x they sound great even at high speed covered in mud with the passengers screaming. Lmao!! They are tough you can was them off with a hose if they break throw them away buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Just exactly what I was in the market for, at a reasonable price and a transaction worth acknowledging as excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great for the price point and just what i needed in my RV
customer_reviews.author: jelowery

customer_reviews.title: Good clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Good clear sound,nice speakers for the price .I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Built own radio system for sxs. Good sound. Clean and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: jaclynn lawless

customer_reviews.title: ... we have top off and get rained outgreat sound good speakers nice
customer_reviews.text: put these in my convertable tracker so they wont get ruined if we have top off and get rained outgreat sound good speakers nice quality
customer_reviews.author: keith w phelps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were way better than expected. Wow they sound great and are built great
customer_reviews.author: Kris gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: qualtiy product
customer_reviews.text: good sound for the price. i put these in my bass boat sound good for somedbody looking for basic speakers
customer_reviews.author: Ken arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: speakers
customer_reviews.text: i am done with the pyle experiment the products are cheap poorly made , spend a little more for something else. you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the money
customer_reviews.text: For this price- I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these speakers. Low expectations lead to positive results I guess, but really- for this price, I'm impressed. Not only do I have no complaints, I still can't believe they sound as good as they do. No they aren't killer audiophile grade speakers, but they are marine grade and sound every bit as good as any average speaker, but way below average on price. The value here simply can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jona Gold

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality sound but for the price, it serves it's purpose. Just needed some cheap speakers to listen to music and I'm getting my use out of them. Not a high quality speaker, that's why I only give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: rickyparish

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. For the price you cannot beat it!! Really great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Jayden Liu

customer_reviews.title: John
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound good in my boat. Instead of cutting a hole in the fiberglass, I purchased a set of 6.5" speaker boxes which makes them portable to where you can locate them where you hear them best.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pyle PLMR16W Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are good. They are performing well. I would definitely recommend them to my boating friends. All of my Amazon experiences have been very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jake M.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: These outdoor speakers sound pretty good on their own for the $10 price tag. Now, next to my Pioneer speakers on the inside of my horse trailer living quarters, there is no comparison, but, these will be used as the outdoor spreakers on the trailer, so I am pleased with the price and the decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: works great for me. i would buy it again. it was exactly what i needed for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: John Wayne

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: worked for about 3 months, if that. they don't work period anymore and we definitely didn't abuse them. had to of only been used a handful of times in those couple months they worked. at normal, old people levels.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: worth the money look good sound good
customer_reviews.text: bought 8 to replace the speakers in my boat the sound is good the price great will buy these again. are the bose no i didnt spend bose money im on the lake not in the stuido . great buy
customer_reviews.author: O-Sumter

product_meta.title: 6.5 Inch Dual Marine Speakers - 2 Way Waterproof and Weather Resistant Outdoor Audio Stereo Sound System with 120 Watt Power, Polypropylene Cone and Cloth Surround - 1 Pair - PLMR61W (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPyle’s Hydra series speakers are waterproof and designed for use in your boat, on the dock, by the pool, or simply mounted outside. They’re designed with rust-proof mesh covers for quality protection. The PLMR61W is a pair of 120-watt, 6.5” two-way, full-range speaker suitable for marine use. These white speakers are equipped with a polypropylene cone with cloth surround and 1” aluminum voice coil for accurate sound reproduction. The molded ABS plastic basket keeps your sound distortion-free. Package includes mounting hardware and wires.
feature_bullets: COMPLETELY WATERPROOF: This is a marine speaker that’s completely waterproof and can be used for several vehicles because it can withstand heavy water splashes and other outdoor conditions

120 WATTS POWER: The speaker has a 20 Oz. circuit magnet for a full range audio and complete stereo speaker sound system. The power output is 120 Watts peak. It has a frequency response of 45Hz-16Khz and 4 Ohms impedance

WEATHER RESISTANT: It’s a weather resistant speaker made of Polypropylene cone with cloth surround for a rugged and durable design. It is also engineered with heavy duty molded ABS plastic basket and grill construction to combat sun damage

LOW PROFILE DESIGN: Constructed with a low profile design with 1” Aluminum voice coil that can be easily used on boats, marine watercraft and other vehicles. The classic white look also gives extra style to the vehicle

6.5” STANDARD SIZE: These marine speakers are easy to install with 6.5 inches standard size, complete wirings and mounting hardware. It has a universal standard OEM replacement size with a mounting depth of only 2.5” and cut-out size of 135mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
